navbar.title: ETH Beijing!
navbar.description: The first Ethereum community event in China in the post-covid-19 era!

intro.title: ETH Beijing Hackthon
intro.decs: The first Ethereum community event in China in the post-covid-19 era!!
intro.content-1: The hackathon is hosted by PKU Blockchain DAO (Beijing University Blockchain Association) and WTF Academy, co-organized by ETHPlanet and Scroll.
intro.content-2: With three main tracks and a total prize pool of $30,000+. As long as you have enough technical or research strength, you are welcome to participate in this event as an individual or in a team!

cards.title: Innovative Layer2 Dapp
cards.description: Build projects on Layer 2 that surprise

Faq.title: FAQ
Faq.ans1: ETH Beijing is an event that bring Ethereum builders to Beijing.
Faq.que2: Who is encouraged to attend this event?
Faq.ans2: ETH Beijing Hackathon aims to bring developers, designers, researchers that want to build a project during a hackathon.
Faq.que3: Does ETH Beijing charge any fees?
Faq.ans3: ETH Beijing is free to attent.
Faq.que4: Will ETH Beijing offer travel scholarships to hackers?
Faq.ans4: we will provide foods, accomodations, and travel compensation to students if budget permits.
Faq.que5: Can I participate remotely at this event?
Faq.ans5: No, ETH Beijing Hackathon is a in-person event in Beijing, and you need to attend in person.
Faq.que6: How many members are allowed on my team?
Faq.ans6: Each team can have up to a maximum of 5 members in total.
Faq.que7: Can I start working on my project before the event?
Faq.ans7: No. In the interest of fairness, attendees should not be working on their projects before the hackathon begins and we do not allow participants to work on pre-existing projects. But you can familarize with the tools of the project.
Faq.que8: What can I build during the event?
Faq.ans8: We provide 3 main tracks and several sponsor tracks in ETH Beijing. Each project must select 1 main track and can optionally select any sponsor tracks that fit.
